summary: A differentiable neural‑network layer that performs joint bilateral filtering on tensors of up to three spatial dimensions, using a separate guidance image to guide edge‑aware smoothing. The spatial and intensity (color) kernel widths are learnable parameters, allowing the filter to adapt during training.
business_intent: Enable end‑to‑end training of edge‑preserving smoothing operations within deep learning pipelines, particularly for medical imaging tasks such as low‑dose CT reconstruction, to improve prediction stability and image quality.
